attributes.review:
The app is horrid, developed by the most disgusting excuse of a president this country has ever seen. I simply do not see how anyone could ever support this evil monstrous over tanned disgrace of a human.
He cares only of the white and privileged.He claims this country would be better off with out the Spanish,blacks,etc. Yet we make up a good percentage of the population and he claims they only come to take jobs and not work which isn’t only contradicting but for many is a false statement. They recognize that many do bring drugs, many do come to slack off and not work, many do come just to have children. But what they pretend not to acknowledge is that so many come for a batter life they come and do jobs that PEOPLE BORN HERE don’t want they come for education they come for things they can’t have in there county.But you all like to pretend that part doesn’t exist. Your not ready to talk ab how Mexico had part of this land first.You want to believe that Colombus found this land. You want to believe lies to avoid the truth, people in the world are so evil and care nothing about fame ,dictatorship and money.The worst part is, people actually still support those people,and that is the saddest truth of all
attributes.title: Racist,disgusting,worst choice of president.

attributes.review: I hate having and Cheeto lookin head ass as my president 🙈✨. Kanye west 2020 💜.
attributes.title: White Supremacist

attributes.review: this app is absolutely hORRIBLE. my grandfather downloaded this app because he was a HUGE trump supporter. Up to where he had the shirts, posters,hats, pens. You name it.. he probably had it. Did you see the past tense? yeah, WAS... he just recently passed due to a seizure from the bad job on manufacturing this app. Not only did it take a whopping 4 minutes and 20 seconds to download but it started to bug out and flashed between screens, and it triggered his epilepsy.After being triggered he started to seize and fell to the ground hitting his head on the way. He was sent to the nearest hospital due to us being on a family trip and didn’t get the proper treatment. He died shortly after receiving his “treatment”. My family is now broke due to the hospital bills and stuff for preparing and having his funeral. i am deeply disappointed that his life had to end short at the ripe age of 69😭do NOT download this poorly made app.
attributes.title: no❤️
